amendment.description: Amendment sought to add language providing for inclusion of items for personal hygiene for household use in the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to add a section at the end of subtitle A of title IV to include items for personal hygiene for household use in the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 297 (Roll no. 265).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 297 (Roll no. 265).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Butterfield.
